Articles.Content:
Just a little poll, i wanna see where people come from.

Please don't talk about how one country is better than another, we're all equally awesome here.

Sorry i couldn't include some of the smaller countries, the poll options only allow for 10 choices.

If you are from a country not on this poll, don't be afraid to post where you're from.

Edited December 1, 2013 by ZedNova
Hot Springs. Arkansas, USA. born in Springfield, Ohio

You really need to add a number of additional areas to your poll, or you're excluding a significant proportion of KSP players. Off the top of my head, Latin America would be a pretty big group all by itself. (Especially since that would include a lot of the guys who are making the game.)
Canadian and proud!

Colorado Springs, Colorado

Have a lovely picture of the city and Front Range.

You really need to add a number of additional areas to your poll, or you're excluding a significant proportion of KSP players. Off the top of my head, Latin America would be a pretty big group all by itself. (Especially since that would include a lot of the guys who are making the game.)

If I remember correctly, only the most epic of the epic ninja-mods are able to change the details of polls. All of the polls I've ever created it was impossible to change anything about the poll or delete it, unless you found a super-mutant-ninja-cyber-mod (SMNCM). How they do it, I have no clue. Even then, I've never seen a poll edited, only deleted, and that was by one of the aforementioned SMNCM's.

**********************

Edited May 20, 2017 by AtleSt
You really should have done it by continent, so you would've covered the entire world
Well, it's written under my avatar. Specifically, this small town at the a** end of our country. Though I'm studying in the capital, currently.

You really should have done it by continent, so you would've covered the entire world

Yeah i should have. Sometimes the stupid in me just rises to the surface and overwhelms my common sense.
Ruhr Valley, Germany

Houghton, MI, USA.

I'm told this sign used to exist. But it's not so bad, I mean, we got to enjoy a thoroughly white Thanksgiving this year.
Espoo, Finland.
San Jose, USA, born Tokyo, JP
Georgetown, Guyana, South America, Planet Earth, Sol, Milky Way, Local Group,V- Wait.... i gone too far didn't i?

I'm glad to see we have a fair number of people from many different countries on here.
